description:
Located in beautiful, historic Bedstuy Brooklyn on quiet tree-lined block, our newly renovated brownstone will make for a perfect stay in Brooklyn.    
Modern kitchen with fully stocked supplies, large luxury bath and garden access make this your home away from home.  
20 minutes into Manhattan, 10 minutes to BK Museum, BAM, Prospect Park.  Great new restaurants within a 10 minute walk and full grocery store on corner.

Guests can also access the garden/backyard from Monday to Friday until 6pm.

Seven minute walk to the Nostrand A/C as well as the Nostrand LIRR.  5 minute walk to the Kingston/Throop C train.
name: Bright Brownstone Garden Apt
review: This place is amazing! I recommend it to anyone and will be using again in the future
